title: Pixel 2xl using mobile data even though it's turned off! How do I stop it?
content: Even though I had roaming data and all mobile data turned off, my pixel 2xl still used data when I was abroad.  This cost my $10 a day for a trickle of data I didn't want my phone to use.  I can't trust my phone abroad if the data off switch doesn't actually turn data off!
